titleStmt.title: A remonstrance humbly presented to the High and Honourable Court of Parliament: touching the insupportable miseries of the poore of the land, especially at this time, and in this great city of London, within the line of communication, and bill of mortality; and the causes thereof. Together with the cure and remedy; and the great care which the princes of other nations, states, countries and cities have taken therein. / By Leonard Lee, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Lee, Leonard.

titleStmt.title: A remonstrance humbly presented to the High and Honourable Court of Parliament: touching the insupportable miseries of the poore of the land, especially at this time, and in this great city of London, within the line of communication, and bill of mortality; and the causes thereof. Together with the cure and remedy; and the great care which the princes of other nations, states, countries and cities have taken therein. / By Leonard Lee, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Lee, Leonard.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.G. for John Rothwell, and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the Sunne in Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Wing has publication year 1644[5]; Thomason catalogue lists under 1645.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
